article:
'Come' was a British noise project which was founded in 1979 by William Bennett.
In the short time of its existence it had such prominent members as Daniel
Miller and J. G. Thirlwell. In the interest of Bennett's main band Whitehouse,
the project was canceled after two albums and one single in 1981.

The Come Organisation was founded as a label for Come and also served as a label
for Whitehouse until the pause of the band.
